short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays an interactive preview of your calendar on the New Tab page along with the current time and great wallpapers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See your Google Calendar on the New Tab page! The interactive calendar view shows the current time, event details, and includes Zoom buttons to easily join your calls

But wait there's more!
- Beautiful wallpapers powered by Unsplash
- View events for different days
- Specify which sub-calendars you want to see in the daily view via Settings
- Event attendee summary including their RSVP status
- Different event border types quickly indicate your current RSVP status
- Events match their calendar's color for easy recognition
- Smart Zoom parsing: removes the extra Zoom information from event descriptions to keep details light
- Smart TimeZone conversion: ensures events are always shown in your local time zone

Notes:
- Only Google Calendar supported currently
- All-day events are not shown
